title: Riot please help
body: I need 3 riot points to get my favourite champion Ziggs can someone please donate 3 riot points to the Kranky foundation it will be usful and will be very thankful

replies.body: Player Support might be able to help you out. :] Have you sent them a [ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new)?
Will player support lend me 975 rp for my shockblade zed skin :D IM SO CLOSE!!! I JUST NEED 975 MORE RP!! SOO CLOSE~~

> Player Support might be able to help you out. :] Have you sent them a [ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new)?

I sent in a ticket to player support asking for a little bit of RP for Galactic Nasus.
"Sorry, we're not allowed to give RP."

I EVEN DREW A PICTURE FOR IT ;~;

> Player Support might be able to help you out. :] 

You sure about that?

please help. I'm... So sad. I play well I'm my ranked games and I just can't win. I want to die. I posted a thread in general discussion on it and it got downvoters. I, metaphorically want to kill myself. Sorry I invaded this thread. I'm a failure. I don't deserve the diamond ranked rewards because I'll get demoted to plat if I played any more ranked.
